## BrowserJsPlumbInstance.removeDragFilter() method

Removes a filter from the list of filters used to determine whether or not a given event should start an element drag.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeDragFilter(filter: Function | string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filter | Function \| string | CSS3 selector, or function that takes an element and returns true/false |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
